title: 16 - Faith as a Habit with Jen Pollock Michel
description:
Is it hard to read your Bible? You're not alone. Join me and my friend Jen as we talk about faith as a habit we practice.

Find Jen's book here: https://www.amazon.com/Habit-Called-Faith-Bible-Follow/dp/1540900533

Here are some resources we talk about:

Bible Project - https://bibleproject.com/
Pray As You Go App - https://pray-as-you-go.org/
She Reads Truth - https://shereadstruth.com/
